name: FI.MUNY.CZ - revamped
description: Makes FI.MUNY document server more aesthetically pleasing. Removed BS (ads, newsletter), changed the fonts and colors (including logos) a little bit.
additional_info: To get it to work on other servers of MUNY family, just edit the line @-moz-document domain(fi.muny.cz) for example to: @-moz-document domain(law.muny.cz) (you will have to change the logo manually though) Index Logo: http://static.muny.cz/muny.cz/(faculty)/gfx/_logo.png Login page Logo: http://static.muny.cz/muny.cz/(faculty)/gfx/_bg_login.png CHANGELOG 25.2.2017 - gradually changing colors for fresh items I am not webdesigner by any means, I just edited it to my likings, so any feedback is welcomed.
